modes.name: Flight
modes.description: Direct flights from Bangkok Suvarnabhumi Airport to Phuket International Airport. Multiple daily flights available.

modes.name: Bus
modes.description: Overnight bus service from Bangkok to Phuket. Comfortable sleeper buses with air conditioning.

modes.name: Train + Bus
modes.description: Take train from Bangkok to Surat Thani, then bus to Phuket. Scenic route through southern Thailand.

modes.name: Car
modes.description: Self-drive option via Highway 4. Beautiful coastal route with stops at Hua Hin and Chumphon.

tips: Book flights in advance for better prices
Overnight bus is most economical option
Car rental allows flexibility to explore along the way
